transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded.

Speaker B: Hello?
Speaker A: Hello, Am I speaking at Lawrence here? Lawrence, yes, speaking. Hello? Hello, Lawrence. Rishabh, this site calling you from Ambitutal.
Speaker B: Pardon?
Speaker A: Calling you from Ambiton. Lawrence, this call is regarding your UCL accommodation.
Speaker B: Yes. Wait, sorry, who's speaking?
Speaker A: I just said Rishabh from Abis Total. We are the official accommodation partner for University College London. Okay, so I can see that you have reached your query with us for IQCRK Coffee room, correct?
Speaker B: Sorry?
Speaker A: You have released a booking request for IQ DRK London, correct?
Speaker B: Oh yeah, don't worry about that. I was, I was just looking. I haven't. I'm not actually like committed to that.
Speaker A: Do you wish to explore more properties?
Speaker B: Sorry, I don't have great signal. I can't really hear you very well.
Speaker A: What I'm saying here is, do you wish to explore some more options? On the basis of that I'll be able to share you some more options.
Speaker B: Not for iq. Really? I'm looking at other places.
Speaker A: I can share you the other places option as well. Can you please confirm, like, what's the budget that you'll be looking for and any specific area that you're looking in?
Speaker B: Sorry, I literally can't hear you. I've got. Can I call you back later?
Speaker A: Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp?
Speaker B: Pardon?
Speaker A: Is it fine if I connect you on WhatsApp?
Speaker B: You can. Look, I'm driving right now, so could you call me back later maybe?
Speaker A: Yeah, sure. Oh yeah, thank you.
Speaker B: All right, bye.
